name: EKObject
desc: An abstract superclass for all EventKit classes that have persistent instances.

items.name: var hasChanges: Bool
items.desc: Returns whether this object or any of the objects it contains has uncommitted changes.

items.name: var isNew: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether this object has ever been saved.

items.name: func refresh() -> Bool
items.desc: Merges changes to this object with the latest saved values.

items.name: func reset()
items.desc: Returns this object to its saved state.

items.name: func rollback()
items.desc: Rolls back the property values of this object to its original state when it was first fetched.
